page.title: 18TOURISM -Caravans/Activities
page.content: 8 privately owned cottages let during holiday season. {CARAVANS-(1)Shipley Farm:OS No 84:0220 60 static caravans all privately owned Residents come mainly from Sunderland There is no sub-let clause in the con- tract. In a good week it is possible to have upwards of 240 on the site which has a small club providing a bar and snooker table. Site owners provide shower & toilet facilities.{(2)Tourist {Caravan Site: Doe Park Farm}5 vans {OUTDOOR ACTIVITIES: Canoeing}-the area is popular for canoeing. Major attrac- tion is availability of white water on the River Tees. {Fishing}- is available at several nearby sites on ponds on the Larting- ton Estate, & stretches of the R Tees {Camping -}is possible on a stretch of ground known as The Hagg which is on the banks of the River Tees.
